resources.string: Are you sure? This will permanently delete your work profile, including all apps inside that profile, their data, and any files.
Unable to setup new work profile
A work profile can be set up on this device, allowing you to securely and privately use the same device for work and personal purposes
To manage the existing work profile, navigate to the Work tab in the launcher
Work apps are marked with a briefcase icon so you can distinguish them from personal apps.
Please wait for the Work Profile Setup Wizard...
